inclusion.criterion: AST/ALT < 2 times upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fertile patients must use effective contraception
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled intercurrent illness including, but not limited to, any of the following:
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Ongoing or active infection or psychiatric illness/social situations that would limit compliance with study requirements
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant history of uncontrolled cardiac disease (i.e., uncontrolled hypertension, unstable angina, or myocardial infarction within the past 3 months)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of interstitial lung disease (e.g., pneumonitis or pulmonary fibrosis) or evidence of interstitial lung disease on chest CT scan
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is experiencing worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy. They have undergone XRT to the neck and RAI ablation.
